name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Automation Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, I excel in **QA** and **Automation** strategies to deliver high-quality software solutions. My expertise includes the use of **Playwright**, **TypeScript**, and various automation frameworks to ensure robust automation processes. I am proficient in creating and executing **E2E** tests, leveraging tools like **Cypress** and **WebDriverIO** to enhance the testing efficiency of web applications.

I have hands-on experience with CI/CD pipelines using tools such as **GitHub Actions**, **GitLab CI**, and **Jenkins**, driving the integration of automated testing into Agile and Scrum methodologies. My development background includes building applications with **Angular**, as well as working with RESTful APIs, making me well-equipped for automation in diverse tech stacks.

Additionally, I possess a strong foundation in SQL and NoSQL databases and a deep understanding of healthcare and financial compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. My ability to leverage AI technologies in automation workflows enables me to implement intelligent testing solutions, contributing to enhanced product reliability and performance.
